results.content: Great course very useful explanation about the complet development process about a rest api with node js and angular with interesting topics as Jwt authentication and so on.

results.content:
The content and quality is ok.
For learning it could be improved because all the code is created without testing. At the end you need to do a lot of debugging. Would be nice if it was brought in smaller parts.

results.content: Course content is not updated to latest versions. No support received for query on connecting mongoAtlas using newer versions. I don`t recommend buying this course for anyone , instead start learning from official docs of latest versions.
